welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Jalajala, Philippines! Known for its stunning natural beauty and warm hospitality, we invite you to immerse yourself in our charming city and discover all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, this terminal is exclusively used by Philippine Airlines for international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Also known as the Domestic Terminal, this terminal serves all domestic flights operated by budget airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout all terminals, but may have limited coverage in certain areas.
